description: With all the swords that everyone seems to bear in this realm, it is only
reasonable that this society would have a large smithy.  What you did NOT
expect, however, was exactly how LARGE the smithy would be!  The building
looks to be bigger than the circles themselves.  Large stone bricks comprise
the outer walls, and a large opening in the ceiling is visible, from which
heavy plumes of smoke are emerging from.  You can enter the smithy to the
east, or go back west to the huts.
The stables are to the south.
15027.name: Outside the Blacksmith's Forge

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15061.name: Herb Garden

description: The sounds of fighting can be heard plainly from the south.  This is
where the training fields of the Swordancers are.  As the dry wind blows
sand into your face, you wonder if you should head back north to the safety
of the stables.
15039.name: Path to the Training Fields

description: You are at the entrance to the stables of the Swordancers.  The smell of
animals and their fecal matter is very strong.  These stables are where the
Swordancers keep their animals for use in both war and domestic life.  A
large wooden roof covers the stable are piled in the southwest corner and a
stray desert rat scurries about.
15036.name: Entrance to the Stables

description: You are in what seems to be an orderly collection of small thatched huts.
Each hut looks similar to each other, with slight differences noticable here
and there.  The intersection lies to the west and more huts lie to the east.
15026.name: Gathering of Huts

description: You are in the Training Fields.  It is here that the Swordancers train
for combat in war or to battle in the Circles of Judgement.  It would be a
very good idea to lay low here, lest you be mistaken for a training dummy.
15040.name: Training Fields

description: You are in the Training Fields.  It is here that the Swordancers train
for combat in war or to battle in the Circles of Judgement.  It would be a
very good idea to lay low here, lest you be mistaken for a training dummy.
15045.name: Training Fields

description: You are in the Circle of Glory.  It is here that the Swordancers seeking
Glory may attain it and receive ranks of power in the Swordancers' society.
15021.name: Circle of Glory

description: You are in what seems to be an orderly collection of small thatched huts.
Each hut looks similar to each other, with slight differences noticable here
and there.  The intersection lies to the west and more huts lie to the east.
15038.name: Gathering of Huts

description: The smithy seems even more spacious inside than it seemed from the
outside.  A gigantic forge sits in the middle of the room, surrounded by
massive hammers, a bellows that appears to take two men working together,
and barrels of water, oil, and salt water.  A large collection of iron
tongs, buttresses, and bins of steel and iron are hung upon the walls or
laying about tables.  The heat in here is, incredibly enough, hotter than it
is outside.  A gigantic mound of coals and ashes lights up the room a
brilliant amber-red and you have no choice but to squint and raise a hand to
shield yourself from both the intense heat and the light.  As smoke begins
to fill your eyes, you wonder if perhaps you should leave.
15029.name: Inside the Swordancers Smithy

description: Errr...  You have stepped from the training room into a GREENHOUSE.  Yes.
A Greenhouse of some sort.  Exotic flowers of every shape and color grow
from a plethora of clay pots.  Lilies, ferns, roses, even daisies grow here.
This is a side of the Chieftain you bet he wants nobody to know.  In fact..
He may kill to keep his secret hidden!
15035.name: Greenhouse

description: As you tread softly upon the hard rocky path here, you notice pommels and
blades of old rusted swords laying scattered about the ground.  As you rack
your brains for myths you have heard about the Swordancers, you can only
come to the conclusion that this is the fabled Path of Broken Swords, a road
that leads to the merciless Swordancer Chief's hut, littered with the broken
weapons of those who dared to challenge him for leadership.  NOW would be a
good time to turn back, if you have any sense.
15030.name: Path of Broken Swords

description: You are in the Circle of Glory.  It is here that the Swordancers seeking
Glory may attain it and receive ranks of power in the Swordancers' society.
15018.name: Circle of Glory

description: You are in the Training Fields.  It is here that the Swordancers train
for combat in war or to battle in the Circles of Judgement.  It would be a
very good idea to lay low here, lest you be mistaken for a training dummy.
15044.name: Training Fields

description: You are in the Circle of Challenge.  It is here that Swordancers
challenge each other to personal Combat for honor, revenge, or simply to
hone their skills.
15015.name: Circle of Challenge

description: You are inside the well now. The exit out is right above you.
15053.name: Inside the Well

description: You are in the Circle of Fate.  Various Swordancers are scattered about
here, awaiting their fate.
15007.name: Circle of Fate

description: You are in the Circle of Fate.  Various Swordancers are scattered about
here, awaiting their fate.
15010.name: Circle of Fate

description: You are in the Circle of Glory.  It is here that the Swordancers seeking
Glory may attain it and receive ranks of power in the Swordancers' society.
15020.name: Circle of Glory

description: You have entered what can only be the room in which the Chieftain
practices his dances of death.  There are practice mats laying about
everywhere, and straw padded dummies hanging out from pegs set on the walls.
Large rents and slashes can be seen in all the dummies and pads, and you
have no choice but to believe that the Chieftain is without doubt, the BEST
Swordancer in the whole Realm.  Weapons of every type sit on racks on the
north wall.  Spears, swords, halberds, staves, clubs, whips, flails,
polearms, daggers, and a myriad of exotic weapons that look too bizarre to
puzzle their purpose gleam dangerously in the low light.
15034.name: Practice Room

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15062.name: Herb Garden

description: You have reached the mouth of a large dark cave.  You have no idea what
it is doing here of all places, nor why there is a large absence of any
Swordancers around here.  The piles upon piles of bones reaches a peak here
and a huge almost solid mass of flies surrounds them.
15051.name: Mouth of the Cave

description: There are bones EVERYWHERE here.  Leg bones, arm bones, skulls, ribs..
You name it..  It's here.  There are a few bones with rotting flesh still
visible here, and a thick swarm of flys and maggots infest the path.  The
stench here is strong but you manage to push on.
15050.name: Bone-Filled Path

description: You are in the Circle of Challenge.  It is here that Swordancers
challenge each other to personal Combat for honor, revenge, or simply to
hone their skills.
15011.name: Circle of Challenge

description: You are in the Training Fields.  It is here that the Swordancers train
for combat in war or to battle in the Circles of Judgement.  It would be a
very good idea to lay low here, lest you be mistaken for a training dummy.
15043.name: Training Fields

description: You have entered the Great Hut of the Chieftain of the Swordancers.  It
is quite spacious in here and luxuries abound everywhere you look.  A grand
bed fashioned from cherrywood is complimented with a baby goosedown mattress
and Asian silk covers.  The grandiose ornate table in the center of the room
seems to be made from gold flecked black marble and the ten chairs standing
around it are made from the same material.  A fine lush red carpet lines the
floor and an imported wall mirror hands upon the south wall.  Large golden
braziers filled with fragrant oil light the room and fill the air with a
sweet aroma.  Above the bed, hung upon the wall, is a heavy jewel-encrusted
scabbard.  You can only shudder as you imagine what the blade must look
like.  There is a door west and the way out lies to the east.
15033.name: Inside the Great Hut

description: You are in the Training Fields.  It is here that the Swordancers train
for combat in war or to battle in the Circles of Judgement.  It would be a
very good idea to lay low here, lest you be mistaken for a training dummy.
15041.name: Training Fields

description: You are in the Circle of Fate.  Various Swordancers are scattered about
here, awaing their fate.
15009.name: Circle of Fate

description: You are outside a large hut.  As you examine the hut, you notice that it
is constructed of a strange translucent leathery material.  Ornamental and
perhaps shamanistic markings, drawn in blood, cover the hut, depicting
battles fought and battles yet to come.  Large wooden spears are placed near
the entrance in a rough semi-circle, the spearheads driven into the rough
sand, strange skulls and feathers decorating the ends of the spears raised
as if in salute...  Or warning.
15023.name: Outside the Hut

description: You have discovered The Dead Pit.  This is where the Swordancers that
died without honor are tossed to rot.  Decaying and rotting bodies fill the
pit and hordes of flies and maggots infest the very walls, themselves
spattered with dried blood.  The smell here is overwhelming and threatens to
overcome you with the fumes of decay.
15014.name: Dead Pit

description: You have reached the fabled Realm of the Swordancers.  A large stone
statue marks this place as the entrance to the Realm, a powerfully built
warrior wielding two swords, carved from a blackish rock boulder.  As you
gaze about, you can make out strange huts to the north.  Behind you, to the
south, lies the way out of the Realm.  Perhaps you should leave the area
now, before you get hurt...
15000.name: Entrance to the Swordancers Realm

description: As you roam through the Realm, you cannot help but wonder in awe how the
Swordancers can survive here.  Nothing but dry sand and hot wind seems to
fill this land.  Jagged rocks line the path north and south, filling you
with dread should you misstep or collapse from exhaustion.  The glare of the
sun fills you eyes but you struggle onwards.  You notice a road leading west
from here.  There is a well that leads down from here.
15004.name: By The Well

description: You are nearing the bottom of the well.  You can hear the gentle swishing
of water beneath you and you try to imagine the secrets this well may hold
inside.  Far above you you can make out the top of the well.
15055.name: Far Inside the Well

description: You are travelling on a deserted empty path.  Here and there you spot
white objects scattered about the rocks and sand on this otherwise boring
and empty path.  As you take a closer look, you gasp as you realize that
they white objects are small fragments of bone.
15048.name: Deserted Path

description: You are travelling through the Realm of the Swordancers.  You feel rather
faint, perhaps from the dehydration and heat that this realm seems to favor.
The climate must say something about the hardiness of the native Swordancers
that inhabit the land.  You shiver despite the heat, thoughts of coming face
to face with one of the angry Swordancers filling your head.
15002.name: Travelling through the Realm

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15060.name: Herb Garden

description: You have reached the northern entrance to the Circles.  To the south lie
the three Circles of Judgement.  To the north lies a large hut of some kind.
15022.name: Entrance to the Circles

description: You are travelling on a deserted empty path.  There is nothing here
except sand and rock.  The road stretches east and west from here.
15047.name: Deserted Path

description: You are in the Circle of Challenge.  It is here that Swordancers
challenge each other to personal Combat for honor, revenge, or simply to
hone their skills.
15013.name: Circle of Challenge

description: You are in the Circle of Glory.  It is here that the Swordancers seeking
Glory may attain it and receive ranks of power in the Swordancers' society.
15017.name: Circle of Glory

description: You are in the Circle of Glory.  It is here that the Swordancers seeking
Glory may attain it and receive ranks of power in the Swordancers' society.
15019.name: Circle of Glory

description: You are in the Training Fields.  It is here that the Swordancers train
for combat in war or to battle in the Circles of Judgement.  It would be a
very good idea to lay low here, lest you be mistaken for a training dummy.
15042.name: Training Fields

description: You stand before the largest hut in the Realm.  Covered completely in
black pitch and reinforced with steel bars, the hut looks VERY intimidating.
A large door stands open here...  Yet the invitation for all to come inside
seems to be rather more menacing than inviting, as if the man who lives here
has no worries about those that attempt to claim leadership by slaying him.
You take a deep breath and make your decision to either walk in, or leave as
quickly as possible.
15032.name: Outside the Chieftain's Hut

description: You are walking on a north-south dusty path through the Realm of the
Swordancers.  The land here is harsh and dry, the desert wind and blazing
sun scorching and whipping your skin mercilessly as you travel through the
realm.  To the north you can make out huts of some type.  To the south lies
the entrance to this Realm.
15001.name: Inside the Swordancers Realm

description: You are in the Circle of Fate.  Various Swordancers are scattered about
here, awaiting their fate.
15006.name: Circle of Fate

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15063.name: Herb Garden

description: You have entered a scene of horror.  Dried blood covers the entire floor
of the cave and the stench is unbearable.  Insects of every kind squirm upon
the grimy and slick bottom and bones of every type you have every seen lay
broken about the cave.  You gasp as you realize that you have entered the
lair of the dreaded Ranmabear!
15052.name: Lair of the Ranmabear

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15059.name: Herb Garden

description: As you walk into this intersection, the task of deciding your paths
begins.  Shall you go north, further into the Realm?  South towards the way
out?  Or East or West where a variety of different huts cluster about?  You
decide to make your choice quickly, or die of heat and dehydration where you
stand.
15003.name: Intersection in the Realm

description: You are inside the well.  It is rather dark and dank in here, but at
least it is an escape from the heat.  Overhead you can still see the top of
the well.  It is too dark below you to see anything.
15054.name: Far Down the Well

description: You have reached the southern entrance to the Circles of Judgement.  To
the north lies the three arenas the Swordancers live by.  Through personal
and group combat they make their day to day decisions for various dilemmas
they may encounter in their hard world.  Perhaps you should not enter the
circles lest you be attacked.
15005.name: Entrance to the Circles

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15065.name: Herb Garden

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15058.name: Herb Garden

description: You are in what seems to be an orderly collection of small thatched huts.
Each hut looks similar to each other, with slight differences noticable here
and there.  The intersection lies to the west and more huts lie to the east.
15025.name: Gathering of Huts

description: The stables seem like any other stables you have seen.  The only
exception is that even here, there are weapons hanging everywhere and
warsaddles laying about.  You can hear the sounds of fighting further south.
15037.name: Stables

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15064.name: Herb Garden

description: You have reached the bottom of the well.  Chest deep in water, you see
nothing, nor feel anything besides wet and cold.  Now that you think about
it, this was a rather stupid idea.  How many people do you know climb down
wells???  It is way to slippery to climb your way out...  You are basically
stuck.  Now you feel even dumber.  Great.
15056.name: Bottom of the Well

description: You are in the Circle of Challenge.  It is here that Swordancers
challenge each other to personal Combat for honor, revenge, or simply to
hone their skills.
15012.name: Circle of Challenge

description: You have entered what seems to be the Healer's herb garden.  Exotic
scents and rare plants grow here, the very smell invigorating you.
15057.name: Herb Garden

description: You are travelling on a deserted empty path.  There is nothing here
except sand and rock.  The road stretches east and west from here.
15046.name: Deserted Path

description: You are in the Circle of Fate.  Various Swordancers are scattered about
here, awating their fate.
15008.name: Circle of Fate

description: You are at the end of the Path of Broken Swords.  Amazingly enough, you
have managed not to cut yourself upon any of the rusted blades that seem to
almost stab out at you from the ground.  To the west is the hut of the
Swordancer Chief.
15031.name: Path of Broken Swords

description: You are in the Healer's Hut.  Somehow, with all the constant fighting and
battles that occur in the Swordancers' Realm, you are not suprised that they
would have a healer living with them.  It is rather dim inside the hut, but
cool and pleasant within this shade.  You can make out various bags, stone
jars, and mortars spread about the large tables in the hut.  A strong herbal
scent permeates the hut, coming perhaps from the baskets heaped with
assorted dried vegetation.  Odd skulls covered with markings litter the
corners and odd shaped of dried exotic animals fill another basket under the
table.  There is a door north and the entrance to the hut lies south.
15024.name: Inside the Healer's Hut

description: The path here is mixed with equal amounts of dry bones and dry rocks.
You can hear a buzzing sound to the west and the path east looks inviting.
As a breeze blows in from the west, you can smell whiffs of decay.
15049.name: Deserted Path

description: You are in what appears to be a Swordancer's abode.  It is a small hut,
with sparse belongings and furnitue.  There is a small wooden bed here, a
simple table, and a few clothes lying about.  You cannot help to wonder how
anyone could live such a boring life, with only swordplay dominating their
existance.
15028.name: Swordancer's Hut

description: You are in the Circle of Challenge.  It is here that Swordancers
challenge each other to personal Combat for honor, revenge, or simply to
hone their skills.
15016.name: Circle of Challenge

description:
The Swordancer Chieftain is HUGE.  Powerful muscles ripple his entire
body as he glares down at you from his seven foot height.  Long black hair
frame his squarish face and steelgrey eyes shoot daggers of death at you. 
His thick beard is cropped short, showing a powerful chin and strong lips
curled in a snarl.  He grabs his sword and leaps at you with a warcry.
15000.room_name: The Swordancer Chieftain is here, braiding tulips into his hair.
15000.name: The Swordancer Chieftain~

description:
Georn is a very large man.  Layer of muscle upon muscle seems to compose
his whole body.  Years of working as a blacksmith for the Swordancers are
obvious.  His arms look to be so massive that they would not even lay
straight against his side if he tried.  Rough features and a hawkish nose
dominate his face and his shock of black hair is tied back carefully so
stray strands of hair will not get in his way as he forges weapons of death.
15001.room_name: Georn the Blacksmith is here, tempering the blade of a longsword.
15001.name: Georn the Blacksmith~
subroutines:
M BRIBE 15004 50000~
M SPEECH 15001 quest~
M SPEECH 15000 items~
M GRALL 15003 100~
M SPEECH 15002 done~

description:
The Healer of the Swordancer is a slim middle-aged woman.  Long amber
hair flows down her back, offsetting her bright emerald green eyes.  As she
moves about competently in her hut, an aura of peace and harmony radiates
from within her, making you feel safe and warm.
15002.room_name: The Swordancer Healer stands here, mixing a poultice.
15002.name: The Swordancer Healer~

description:
This is the standard guard of the Swordancers.  He looks competent, and
fingers his sword as if wish you to make any sword of threatening movement
towards him.
15003.room_name: A Swordancer Guard stands here, alertly scanning for intruders.
15003.name: The Swordancer Guard~

description:
This is a typical average Swordancer citizen.  The citizen looks strong,
as if all the weak were filter out of their society.  A plain tunic and
breeches complete the outfit, complemented with simple boots and a sword, of
course.
15004.room_name: A Swordancer citizen stands here, looking for someone to fight.
15004.name: The Swordancer citizen~

description:
Tsung Wei Chen is the society's most ambitious Swordancer.  He waits and
plots to kill the Chief through means other than through fair combat, since
he knows he has no chance to slay the Chieftain in fair combat.  Right now,
he is frustrated and takes it out on any that come in his way.  This
includes YOU!
15005.room_name: Tsung Wei Chen is here, killing everyone in a berserk fury.
15005.name: Tsung Wei Chen~

description:
Kejie Swordancer is a small yet cute girl.  Her innocent eyes blink
widely at you as she weaves her weapon in a complex pattern of motions too
fast for your eyes to follow.  You can only wonder how many mere mortal men
have fallen to her.
15006.room_name: Kejie Swordancer is here, practicing movements.
15006.name: Kejie Swordancer~

description:
Kierath is a standard Swordancer arena-master.  Tall, lithe, muscular,
and a master of movement and swordstrokes, he has cast aside his shield and
usual sword to learn instead the art of using a two-handed sword.  As he
flips and tumbles about, slicing his blade through the air in a whirlwind,
you wonder what it would be like to engage such a man in combat.
15007.room_name: Kierath Swordancer is here, practicing with his sword.
15007.name: Kierath Swordancer~

description:
Fong Sai Yuk is the only Swordancer to fight without a weapon.  Utilizing
his chi, he focuses his energy into his stomach and releases it in a flurry
of punches and kicks.  A master of martial arts, Fong Sai Yuk is just as
deadly, if not more so, as any armed Swordancer.
15008.room_name: Fong Sai Yuk is here, meditating.
15008.name: Fong Sai Yuk~

description:
Soren Swordancer is an upstanding young Swordancer that promises to one
day be perhaps one of the warriors of legend.  For now, however, he stays in
the Realm, honing his skills sharper and sharper.
15009.room_name: Soren Swordancer is sharpening his sword here.
15009.name: Soren Swordancer~

15010.room_name: An Elite Swordancer Guard stands at attention here.
15010.name: The Elite Swordancer Guard~

description:
This horse is BIG.  A heavy spiked leather warsaddle sits on its back and
straps to hold spears, banners, and sword hang down from its powerful sides.
Muscular flanks and legs move restlessly and you think about leaving this
area for fear of being trampled.
15011.room_name: A warhorse is here, pawing the ground impatiently.
15011.name: A Warhorse~

description:
Lenna is a tall, muscular woman.  Her long raven-black hair is tied back
in a ponytail and her fierce hazel eyes are focused within herself.  As she
slashes the air and dances her dance, she catches notice of you and flashes
you a quick grin.
15012.room_name: Lenna Swordancer is here, training her swordplaying.
15012.name: Lenna Swordancer~

description:
The Ranmabear is an abhorrent creature of twisted magic.  Once a man, he
angered a powerful magician who then cursed him to dwell in the form
forever.  Banished, the Ranmabear took up refuge near the Realm of the
Swordancers, sustaining itself with the bodies of the brave Swordancers that
have come in a vain attempt to slay this horrible monstrosity.
15013.room_name: The Ranmabear is here, gnawing on a bone.
15013.name: The Ranmabear~

15014.room_name: A Man-Eating Plant is here, waiting to be fed.
15014.name: The man-eating plant~

description:
Jennine Swordancer is a slight girl.  Utilizing her size as an advantage
instead of a handicap, she has learned the art of throwing her opponent and
using their own larger mass against them.  Since the usual Swordancer swords
are so large and bulky for her, she uses a shorter slimmer blade and weaves
her dance deadly.
15015.room_name: Jennine Swordancer is here, playing with her weapons.
15015.name: Jennine Swordancer~

description:
Shimmie Swordancer is the drunkest person you have ever seen.  Completely
sloshed upon imported Australian beer, he wobbles about, using his sword as
a cane, singing bawdy ballads about rich women.
15016.room_name: Shimmie Swordancer is here, drunk as a bug in a rug.
15016.name: Shimmie Swordancer~

description:
Pomme Swordancer is a large woman, stubborn as a desert camel, with a
voice loud enought to here from miles away.  As she screams loudly in
frustration, she spies you and draws her weapon, ready to take out her
irritation upon you.
15017.name: Pomme Swordancer~

description:
BloodWolf Swordancer is a massive man, built tall and built well.  Cords
of rock hard muscles and tendons stand out as he stretches from side to
side, warming himself up before a match.  His cold grey eyes regard you
coolly as he oils his weapon with a smile.
15018.room_name: BloodWolf Swordancer is here, stretching his muscles.
15018.name: BloodWolf Swordancer~

description: This Gladiator is training to become one of the KNOWN Swordancers.
15019.room_name: A Gladiator Swordancer is here, training.
15019.name: A gladiator Swordancer~

description: This Gladiator is training to become one of the KNOWN Swordancers.
15020.room_name: An Elite Gladiator Swordancer is here, training.
15020.name: An elite gladiator Swordancer~

description: This warrior is training to become one of the KNOWN Swordancers.
15021.room_name: A Warrior Swordancer is here, training.
15021.name: A warrior Swordancer~

description: This elite warrior is training to become one of the KNOWN Swordancers.
15022.room_name: An Elite Warrior Swordancer is here, training.
15022.name: An Elite Warrior Swordancer~

description: This trainer is teaching the Swordancers-in-training how to improve.
15023.room_name: A Trainer Swordancer is here, training.
15023.name: A trainer Swordancer~

description: This veteran Swordancer is here, reliving his youth.
15024.room_name: A veteran Swordancer is here, training.
15024.name: A veteran Swordancer~
